title: Hide automated in-app system toast messages

requirements.text: Suppress/hide all automated in-app system toast notifications (e.g., Sonner toasts such as "Mission created successfully") so they do not render anywhere in the UI.

quotes: The automated messages in the app, e.g. "mission created successfully" etc., should be hidden and not shown in the app. Don't change absolutely anything else in the app and its functionality, only hide the automated messages.

acceptanceCriteria: After actions that previously showed success/error/info toasts (e.g., creating a mission), no toast notification is displayed to the user.
No other UI/UX, layout, navigation, or business logic changes occur aside from removing/hiding the automated toast messages.
The app compiles and runs without requiring any changes to immutable Shadcn UI component source files (frontend/src/components/ui).

constraints: Do not change any application behavior or features other than hiding automated in-app messages/toasts.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable).
No backend changes or state migrations are allowed/needed for this request.
nonGoals: Changing validation logic, mission creation/deletion flows, or error handling behavior beyond hiding the UI notifications.
Translating or rewriting the toast message strings (they should simply not appear).
